content.prompt: The fuel consumption of a car, in miles per gallon (mpg), is modeled by F( s )=6 e ( s 20 âˆ’ s 2 2400 ) MathType@MTEF@5@5@@4714@ , where s is the speed of the car, in miles per hour.
